Wisdom: يَتَفَاضَلُ النَّاسُ بِالْعُلُومِ وَالْعُقُولِ لَا بِالْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأُصُولِ
enWisdom: People attain superiority through knowledge and intellect, not by wealth and lineage

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يَمْنَحُ الْمَالَ مَنْ يُحِبُّ وَيُبْغِضُ وَلَا يَمْنَحُ الْعِلْمَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَحَبَّ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, bestows wealth to the one whom He loves and the one whom He hates, but He does not grant knowledge except to the one whom He loves

Wisdom: حُبُّ الْعِلْمِ وَحُسْنُ الْحِلْمِ وَلُزُومُ الثَّوَابِ مِنْ فَضَائِلِ أُولِي النُّهَى وَالْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: Love of knowledge, virtuous forbearance and adhering to the right are from the merits of the people of reason and understanding

Wisdom: كُلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ يَنْقُصُ عَلَى الْإِنْفَاقِ إِلَّا الْعِلْمَ
enWisdom: Everything diminishes when it is expended except knowledge

Wisdom: يُنْبِئُ عَنْ فَضْلِكَ عِلْمُكَ وَعَنْ إِفْضَالِكَ بَذْلُكَ
enWisdom: Your knowledge conveys your merit and your generosity tells of your kindness
There is no guide more successful than knowledge

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ مَا مَنَّ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ بِهِ عَلَى عِبَادِهِ عِلْمٌ وَعَقْلٌ وَمُلْكٌ وَعَدْلٌ
enWisdom: The best things that Allah, the Glorified, has blessed his servants with are: knowledge, intelligence, power and justice

Wisdom: كُلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ يَعِزُّ حِينَ يَنْزُرُ إِلَّا الْعِلْمَ فَإِنَّهُ يَعِزُّ حِينَ يَغْزُرُ
enWisdom: Everything becomes precious when it becomes less (or scarce) except knowledge, for indeed it gains value when it abounds

Wisdom: مَا أَصْدَقَ الْمَرْءَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ وَأَيُّ شَاهِدٍ عَلَيْهِ كَفِعْلِهِ وَلَا يُعْرَفُ الرَّجُلُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِ كَمَا لَا يُعْرَفُ الْغَرِيبُ مِنَ الشَّجَرِ إِلَّا عِنْدَ حُضُورِ الثَّمَرِ فَتَدُلُّ الْأَثْمَارُ عَلَى أُصُولِهَا وَيُعْرَفُ لِكُلِّ ذِي فَضْلٍ فَضْلُهُ كَذَلِكَ يَشْرُفُ الْكَرِيمُ بِآدَابِهِ وَيَفْتَضِحُ اللَّئِيمُ بِرَذَائِلِهِ
enWisdom: How truthful is a person’s testimony against himself and what witness is there against him better than his own deeds?! A man is not recognized except by his knowledge, just as a strange tree is not known except when it bears fruit, thus the fruits are evidence of its originsThe excellence of every person is known by his merit, and thus the honourable one is distinguished by his morals and the vile one is disgraced by his wickedness
Knowledge is indeed a good guide

Wisdom: كُلُّ وِعَاءٍ يَضِيقُ بِمَا جُعِلَ فِيهِ إِلَّا وِعَاءَ الْعِلْمِ فَإِنَّهُ يَتَّسِعُ
